failure.message: Ensure no security groups allow egress from 0.0.0.0:0 to port -1

testcase.failure:
Resource: aws_security_group.lambda_sg File: /main.tf: 132-144 Guideline: https://docs.prismacloud.io/en/enterprise-edition/policy-reference/aws-policies/aws-networking-policies/bc-aws-382
132 | resource "aws_security_group" "lambda_sg" { 133 | name = "lambda-security-group" 134 | description = "Security group for Lambda" 135 | vpc_id = data.aws_vpc.default.id 136 | 137 | egress { 138 | from_port = 0 139 | to_port = 0 140 | protocol = "-1" 141 | cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"] 142 | description = "Allow all outbound traffic" 143 | } 144 | }
